main.name: AdeelAhmed Dar
main.bio: - As a full-stack developer with a broad and versatile coding skill set, I excel at quickly transforming ideas and prototypes into reality for startups and enterprises. During my career, I have been focusing on using Javascript/Typescript technologies(React.js, Node.js, Angular, Next.js, etc) with GraphQL, AWS, CI/CD and other web technologies
main.bio1: As a software engineer with 9 years of experience, the values I can bring to the team include good software skills and team culture. I continuously seek to improve the performance of project and code quality with insatiable curiosity
main.bio2: - As a customer-focused engineer, I am always trying to make sure that we are solving the big valuable problems and understand the needs of each and every potential projects
main.bio3: - I am the go-to guy for any of your development needs.
main.bio4: I love working with great people, inspiring others, and being inspired.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

testimonials.text: AdeelAhmed Dar is an outstanding software engineer and truly one of the best communicators I've ever had the pleasure to work with.

His engineering experience crosses the entire web stack - most recently React/Redux and Node application development for GraphQL Designer - to rapidly prototype a full-stack GraphQL application. His engineering approach emphasizes building truly scalable applications with AWS EC2, integrating dynamic load balancing and scalable servers
testimonials.user: Dehininet Birhan - Product Manager at Curate
